 1998-01261998-02-050,  ,  ,  ,  NR
PrecisEnactment of the CERTAIN TAXPAYERS REMISSION ORDER, 1997-5 - which provides for the remission of (a) income tax and interest payable by 33 individuals, (b) tax and interest resulting from an excess contribution to an RRSP by one individual, and (c) minimal amounts of assessed tax on excessive small business property holdings of RRSP.
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1998-0031 Publication Date: 1998-02-18
